DOC.brief_summary: This study will address the treatment rate and control rate of hypertension, treatment pattern and factors to affect blood pressure control by examining (retrospective) medical records of hypertension patients having Type 2 Diabetes mellitus, among outpatients coming to the Endocrinology Department in 20 general hospital settings nationwide.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Survey for Patients With Hypertension and Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Outpatient Type II DM patients receiving hypertension medication in 2006 Patient with Type II DM receiving hypertension medication during at least 1 year. Secondary hypertension patients Patients not receiving hypertension medication
